trans-unit.source: API (this includes KDE, amongst others) API, gnome-screensaver, XSS and/or DPMS, xautolock.

Caffeine is a little daemon that sits in your systray, and prevents the screensaver from showing up, or the system from going to sleep. It does so when an application is fullscreened (eg: youtube), or when you click on the systray icon (which you can do, when, eg: reading).
trans-unit.target: 咖啡因是一个小守护进程,它位于您的系统托盘中,防止屏幕保护程序出现,或系统进入睡眠状态。它这样做的时候,一个应用程序是全屏的(例如:YouTube),或者当你点击systray图标(你可以做,当,例如:阅读)。

trans-unit.source: Caffeine-ng is distributed under the GNU General Public License, either version 3, or (at your option) any later version. See LICENCE for details.
trans-unit.target: Caffeine-ng 以 GNU 通用公共许可证(GNU General Public License)第 3 版或(由您选择)任何更新的版本发布。详情请看LICENCE。

trans-unit.source: Caffeine-ng was shortly know as Taurine, a play on its successor’s name, since taurine is a known stimulant, commonly found in energy drinks. However, this name did not last, since the artwork would not match adequately, and changing it was undesirable.
trans-unit.target: 由于牛磺酸是一种已知的兴奋剂，通常在能量饮料中发现，因此咖啡因（Caffeine-ng）很快被称为牛磺酸，以其继任者的名字命名。但是，这个名称并没有持续，因为艺术品无法充分匹配，因此更改它是不可取的。

trans-unit.target: 版权所有（C）2009 The Caffeine Developers版权所有（C）2014-2018 Hugo Osvaldo Barrera < hugo@barrera.io >

trans-unit.source: Either a screensaver that implements the
trans-unit.target: 要么是实现屏幕保护程序的

trans-unit.source: If you want to test out a translation without changing the language for the whole session: “LANG=ru_RU.UTF-8 ./bin/caffeine” (Replace ru_RU.UTF-8 with whatever language you want to use. You will need to a language pack for the specific language) Be aware that some stock items will not be translated unless you log in with a given language.
trans-unit.target: 如果要在不更改整个会话语言的情况下测试翻译，请执行以下操作：“ LANG = ru_RU.UTF-8 ./bin/caffeine”（将ru_RU.UTF-8替换为您要使用的任何语言。您需要特定语言的语言包）。请注意，除非您使用给定的语言登录，否则不会翻译某些库存项目。

trans-unit.source: On ArchLinux, caffeine-ng is available at the AUR.

The Caffeien-ng SVG shortcut icons are Copyright (C) 2009 Tommy Brunn (http://www.blastfromthepast.se/blabbermouth), and distributed under the terms of the GNU Lesser General Public License, either version 3, or (at your option) any later version. See LGPL.
trans-unit.target: Caffeien-ng SVG快捷方式图标是版权所有（C）2009 Tommy Brunn（http://www.blastfromthepast.se/blabbermouth），并根据GNU通用公共许可协议（版本3）或（在您的选项）任何更高版本。参见LGPL。

trans-unit.source: The Caffeine-ng status icons are Copyright (C) 2014 mildmojo (http://github.com/mildmojo), and distributed under the terms of the GNU Lesser General Public License, either version 3, or (at your option) any later version. See LGPL.
trans-unit.target: Caffeine-ng状态图标的版权为（C）2014 minormojo（http://github.com/mildmojo），并根据GNU通用通用公共许可协议（版本3或以后选择的版本）的条款进行分发。版。参见LGPL。

trans-unit.source: The intention of this fork is to also evolve on its own, not only fixing issues, but also implemented missing features, when relevant.
trans-unit.target: 这个分叉的目的也是为了自己的发展,不仅修复问题,还在相关的时候实现了缺失的功能。

trans-unit.source: This is a fork of Caffeine 2.4, since later versions dropped support for the systray icon in favour of only automatic detection of fullscreen apps only, which resulted rather controversial.
trans-unit.target: 这是Caffeine 2.4的分支，因为更高版本放弃了对systray图标的支持，而只支持仅自动检测全屏应用程序，这引起了 很大争议。

trans-unit.source: To have Caffeine-ng run on startup, add it to your System Settings => Startup Programs list.
trans-unit.target: 要使Caffeine-ng在启动时运行，请将其添加到“系统设置=>启动程序”列表中。

trans-unit.source: Tray bar app to temporarily inhibit screensaver and sleep mode.
trans-unit.target: 托盘栏应用,暂时抑制屏保和睡眠模式。
